alert.note: Alert for Coastal Onslow (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued May 26 at 3:38PM EDT until May 26 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM SATURDAY TO 2 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Beach Hazards Statement, strong longshore currents in the surf zone. For the High Surf Advisory, large breaking waves of 5 to 8 feet expected in the surf zone. * WHERE...Onslow County beaches. * WHEN...For the Beach Hazards Statement, until 8 PM EDT this evening. For the High Surf Advisory, from 8 AM Saturday to 2 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming and surfing conditions and localized beach erosion. Strong longshore currents will create dangerous swimming conditions.
info.instruction: Swimmers should remain out of the water due to dangerous surf conditions.
